text: @realDonaldTrump I have been working through this entire pandemic. We cannot talk about returning to work WEEKS before we reach our peak of infected individuals. Hundreds of people are becoming infected daily, we can’t worry about returning to work when we are still fighting to survive this!

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
